full_summary:
### Washer Extractor Tender Notice
#### Solicitation Number: WS3696003395

*Published Date:* June 14, 2023
*Closing Date:* July 11, 2023, at 2:00 PM MDT

**Project Background:**

Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide a washer extractor for the laundry facility at the Bowden Institution in Innisfail, Alberta.

**Solicitation Details:**

*   Solicitation Number: WS3696003395
*   Publication Date: June 14, 2023
*   Closing Date: July 11, 2023, at 2:00 PM MDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: As soon as possible
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Key Contact Information:**

*   Procurement Representative: Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Phone: Not Provided
*   Email: [ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16569608?extsite=MTY1Njk2MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Attachments:** None

**Amendment:**

This solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number WS3696003395 (Doc3887087420) dated March 7, 2023, with a closing date of April 12, 2023, at 12:00 PM MDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to offerors who submitted bids on the previous solicitation.

Please note that all supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by July 11, 2023, at 2:00 PM MDT. Bids submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.
